item.title: January 20, 2025, at 2:52:22 PM
item.description: It snowed here again last night and it’s fucking cold. As I write this, it’s about time to take Trix out for her afternoon walk and it’s only 25° and feels like 13°. We have three more days of this Arctic weather. I like the cold weather. Getting all bundled up in layers of my winter clothes.
